name: Project Deadnight (Prototype)
description:
Wanted to try some things and ended up working on this for about 2 weeks or so. A little 3D topdown zombie action survival whatever prototype with some (pretty unfinished) features:

- different guns and abilities, aquired through questsystem

- score and combosystem

- classic lineup of your favourite zombie enemies

- lots of random assets from wherever mashed together wildly

- no real tutorial but a cool slowmotion mode when you press R

- 2 secret extra locations with no content

gonna add music soon, i swear

SPOILER WARNING:

Nothing happens yet if you survive for the whole 10 minutes. Ta-da
